00003 //!
00004 //! \brief This file contains the low level macros and definition for the ADC

00041 #ifndef ADC_DRV_H
00042 #define ADC_DRV_H
00043 
00044 //_____ I N C L U D E S ____________________________________________________
00045 
00046 #ifndef  ADHSM
00047 #define  ADHSM   7
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 //! @defgroup ADC_module ADC Module
00051 //! ADC Module
00052 //! @{
00053 //_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________
00054 
00055    //! @defgroup ADC_macros ADC Macros
00056    //! Low level macros that permit the use of the ADC of the product.
00057    //! @{
00058 
00059       //! @defgroup Turn_on_adc Turn on the ADC
00060       //! Turn on the ADC
00061       //! @{
00062 #define Enable_adc()                         (ADCSRA |= (1<<ADEN))
00063       //! @}
00064 
00065       //! @defgroup ADC_alignement_configuration ADC Alignement Configuration
00066       //! Configure the Result alignement
00067       //! @{
00068 #define Right_adjust_adc_result()            (ADMUX  &= ~(1<<ADLAR))
00069 #define Left_adjust_adc_result()             (ADMUX  |=  (1<<ADLAR))
00070       //! @}
00071 
00072       //! @defgroup ADC_high_speed_mode_configuration ADC High Speed Mode Configuration
00073       //! Set the high spped mode in case ADC frequency is higher than 200KHz
00074       //! @{
00075 #define Enable_adc_high_speed_mode()         (ADCSRB |=  (1<<ADHSM))
00076 #define Disable_adc_high_speed_mode()        (ADCSRB &= ~(1<<ADHSM))
00077       //! @}
00078 
00079          //! @defgroup ADC_digital_input
00080          //! Disable the digital input buffers for ADC pins in use.
00081          //! If debugging, only disable pins not used by JTAG
00082          //! @{
00083 #if (DEBUG == 0)
00084    #define Disable_digital_input()                   (DIDR0 |= 0xFF)
00085 #else
00086    #define Disable_digital_input()                   (DIDR0 |= ((1<<ADC1D) \
00087                                                                |(1<<ADC2D)))
00088 #endif
00089          //! @}
00090 
00091       //! @defgroup ADC_vref_configuration ADC Vref Configuration
00092       //! Configure the Vref
00093       //! @{
00094 #define Enable_internal_vref()               (ADMUX  |=  ((1<<REFS1)|(1<<REFS0)) )
00095 #define Enable_external_vref()               (ADMUX  &= ~((1<<REFS1)|(1<<REFS0)) )
00096 #define Enable_vcc_vref()                    (ADMUX  &= ~(1<<REFS1),          \
00097                                               ADMUX  |=  (1<<REFS0) )
00098       //! @}
00099 
00100       //! @defgroup ADC_it_configuration ADC IT Configuration
00101       //! Configure the ADC IT
00102       //! @{
00103 #define Enable_all_it()                      (SREG   |=  (0x80) )
00104 #define Disable_all_it()                     (SREG   &= ~(0x80) )
00105 #define Enable_adc_it()                      (ADCSRA |=  (1<<ADIE) )
00106 #define Disable_adc_it()                     (ADCSRA |= ~(1<<ADIE) )
00107 #define Clear_adc_flag()                     (ADCSRA &=  (1<<ADIF) )
00108 #define Clear_adc_adif()                     (ADCSRA |=  (1<<ADIF) )
00109       //! @}
00110 
00111       //! @defgroup ADC_prescaler_configuration ADC Prescaler Configuration
00112       //! Configure the ADC prescaler
00113       //! @{
00114 #define Set_prescaler(prescaler)             (ADCSRA &= ~((1<<ADPS2)|(1<<ADPS1)|(1<<ADPS0)),\
00115                                               ADCSRA |=  (prescaler) )
00116       //! @}
00117 
00118       //! @defgroup ADC_channel_selection ADC Channel Selection
00119       //! Select the ADC channel to be converted
00120       //! @{
00121 #define Clear_adc_mux()                      (ADMUX  &= ~((1<<MUX3)|(1<<MUX2)|(1<<MUX1)|(1<<MUX0)) )
00122 #define Select_adc_channel(channel)          (Clear_adc_mux(), ADMUX |= (channel) )
00123       //! @}
00124 
00125       //! @defgroup ADC_start_conversion ADC Start Conversion
00126       //! Start the Analog to Digital Conversion
00127       //! @{
00128 
00129          //! @defgroup ADC_start_normal_conversion ADC Start Normal Conversion
00130          //! Start the conversion in normal mode
00131          //! @{
00132 #define Start_conv()                          (ADCSRA |= (1<<ADSC) )
00133 #define Start_conv_channel(channel)           (Select_adc_channel(channel), Start_conv() )
00134 #define Start_amplified_conv()                (ADCSRB |= (1<<ADASCR) )
00135 #define Stop_amplified_conv()                 (ADCSRB &= ~(1<<ADASCR) )
00136 #define Start_amplified_conv_channel(channel) (Select_adc_channel(channel), Start_amplified_conv() )
00137          //! @}
00138 
00139          //! @defgroup ADC_start_idle_conversion ADC Start Idle Conversion
00140          //! Start the Analog to Digital Conversion in noise reduction mode
00141          //! @{
00142 #define Start_conv_idle()                    (SMCR   |=  (1<<SM0)|(1<<SE) )
00143 #define Start_conv_idle_channel(channel)     (Select_adc_channel(channel), Start_conv_idle() )
00144 #define Clear_sleep_mode()                   (SMCR   &= ~(1<<SM0)|(1<<SE) )
00145          //! @}
00146 
00147       //! @}
00148 
00149       //! @defgroup ADC_get_x_bits_result ADC Get x Bits Result
00150       //! ADC Get x Bits Result
00151       //! @{
00152 #define Adc_get_8_bits_result()               ((U8)(ADCH))
00153 #define Adc_get_10_bits_result()              ((U16)(ADCL+((U16)(ADCH<<8))))
00154       //! @}
00155 
00156 
00157       //! @defgroup Turn_off_adc Turn Off or on the ADC
00158       //! Turn Off or on the ADC
00159       //! @{
00160 #define Disable_adc()                        (ADCSRA &= ~(1<<ADEN))
00161 #define  Enable_adc()                        (ADCSRA |= (1<<ADEN))
00162       //! @}
00163 
00164       //! @defgroup Check conversion is finished or not
00165       //! Check conversion status
00166       //! @{
00167 #define Is_adc_conv_finished()               ((ADCSRA &  (1<<ADIF)) ? TRUE : FALSE)
00168 #define Is_adc_conv_not_finished()           ((ADCSRA | ~(1<<ADIF)) ? TRUE : FALSE)
00169       //! @}
00170 
00171 
00172    //! @}
00173 
00174 //_____ D E F I N I T I O N S ______________________________________________
00175 
00176 //_____ F U N C T I O N S __________________________________________________
00177    //! @defgroup ADC_low_level_functions ADC Low Level Fucntions
00178    //! ADC Low Level Functions
00179    //! @{
00180 
00181 //! Configures the ADC accordingly to the ADC Define Configuration values.
00182 //! Take care that you have to select the ports which will be converted as
00183 //! analog inputs thanks to the DIDR0 and DIDR1 registers.
00184 //!
00185 void init_adc(void);
00186    //! @}
00187 
00188 //! @}
00189 
00190 #endif  // ADC_DRV_H
